title: Fear
description: He is fear himself. She, who fears him. On the first day of her new life, at a new school, she is thrown to him by fates for his amusement. But amusement is the least of what she rouses in him. Like an obsession she burns in him. With one look she owned his soul. Now all he wants is to own her. Body and soul, make her his. But how do you win a heart that doesn't want to be won? You seize it!
author: Sierra Jaid
